abstract: Blackphone 2, a smartphone scheduled to be released in July, would, among other features, give users the ability to cluster apps with different functions into groups separated from one another.

headline.main: Blackphone Announces New Privacy-Oriented Phone and Tablet

snippet: Blackphone 2, a smartphone scheduled to be released in July, would, among other features, give users the ability to cluster apps with different functions into groups separated from one another.
